flavorText: Descended from Old Capenna's paladins, the Brokers are masters of defensive combat.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Brokers stammen von den Paladinen von Alt-Capenna ab und sind Meister der defensiven Kampfkunst.
foreignData.name: Adrette Schildmaid
foreignData.text:
Die Adrette Schildmaid kommt mit einer Schildmarke ins Spiel. (Falls ihr Schaden zugefügt oder sie zerstört würde, entferne stattdessen eine Schildmarke von ihr.)
Solange es dein Zug ist, erhält die Adrette Schildmaid +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: Los Mediadores descienden de los paladines de la antigua Capenna y dominan a la perfección el combate defensivo.
foreignData.name: Escudante sofisticada
foreignData.text:
La Escudante sofisticada entra al campo de batalla con un contador de escudo sobre ella. (Si fuera a recibir daño o a ser destruida, en vez de eso, remueve un contador de escudo de ella.)
Mientras sea tu turno, la Escudante sofisticada obtiene +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: Descendant des paladins de la Vieille Capenna, les Courtiers sont des maîtres du combat défensif.
foreignData.name: Compagnonne bouclier élégante
foreignData.text:
La Compagnonne bouclier élégante arrive sur le champ de bataille avec un marqueur « bouclier » sur elle. (Si elle devait subir des blessures ou être détruite, retirez-lui un marqueur « bouclier » à la place.)
Tant que c'est votre tour, la Compagnonne bouclier élégante gagne +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: Discendenti dai paladini di Vecchia Capenna, gli Intermediari sono maestri nel combattimento difensivo.
foreignData.name: Scutifera Elegante
foreignData.text:
La Scutifera Elegante entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino scudo. (Se sta per subire danno o sta per essere distrutta, rimuovi invece un segnalino scudo da essa.)
Fintanto che è il tuo turno, la Scutifera Elegante prende +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: 旧カペナの聖騎士の末裔ゆえに、斡旋屋一家は防衛戦闘術の達人ぞろいである。
foreignData.name: 粋な盾仲間
foreignData.text:
粋な盾仲間は盾カウンター１個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。（これがダメージを受けるか破壊されるなら、代わりにこれの上から盾カウンター１個を取り除く。）
あなたのターンであるかぎり、粋な盾仲間は＋２/＋０の修整を受ける。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: 올드 카펜나의 성기사들의 후예인 브로커즈는 수비적인 전투의 대가들이다.
foreignData.name: 말쑥한 방패병
foreignData.text:
말쑥한 방패병은 방패 카운터 한 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다. (이 생물이 피해를 입거나 파괴되려 한다면, 대신 이 생물에서 방패 카운터 한 개를 제거한다.)
당신의 턴인 한, 말쑥한 방패병은 +2/+0을 받는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Descendentes dos paladinos da Velha Capenna, os Mediadores são mestres do combate defensivo.
foreignData.name: Escudeira Elegante
foreignData.text:
Escudeira Elegante entra no campo de batalha com um marcador de escudo. (Se ela sofreria dano ou seria destruída, em vez disso, remova um marcador de escudo dela.)
Enquanto for o seu turno, Escudeira Elegante receberá +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: Брокеры, потомки паладинов Старой Капенны, — мастера оборонительного боя.
foreignData.name: Щеголеватая Щитоносица
foreignData.text:
Щеголеватая Щитоносица выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном щита на ней. (Если она должна получить повреждения или быть уничтожена, вместо этого удалите с нее один жетон щита.)
Пока длится ваш ход, Щеголеватая Щитоносица получает +2/+0.

foreignData.flavorText: 扶济社渊流自旧卡佩纳的神圣武士，精通防御战术。
foreignData.name: 正装驭盾手
foreignData.text:
正装驭盾手进战场时上面有一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）
只要是在你的回合中，正装驭盾手便得+2/+0。

foreignData.flavorText: 扶濟社淵流自舊卡佩納的神聖武士，精通防禦戰術。
foreignData.name: 正裝馭盾手
foreignData.text:
正裝馭盾手進戰場時上面有一個後盾指示物。（如果它將受到傷害或將被消滅，則改為從其上移去一個後盾指示物。）
只要是在你的回合中，正裝馭盾手便得+2/+0。

name: Dapper Shieldmate
originalText:
Dapper Shieldmate enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
As long as it's your turn, Dapper Shieldmate gets +2/+0.

rulings.text: Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

text:
Dapper Shieldmate enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
As long as it's your turn, Dapper Shieldmate gets +2/+0.
